entry.title: ConsenSys, LivePerson Roll Out VillageDAO to Solve Crypto's Customer Service Problem
entry.summary: The DAO launched in partnership with LivePerson aims to be a decentralized customer service platform.

entry.title: Justice Department Charges Defendant With Sending $10M in Bitcoin to Sanctioned Country
entry.summary: “Like Jason Voorhees, the myth of virtual currency’s anonymity refuses to die,” a federal judge wrote about using Bitcoin to dodge sanctions.

entry.title: Tether Supply Plummeted $7.4B Amid Depegging Concerns, Terra Collapse: Glassnode
entry.summary: Amid Terra’s collapse last week, Tether also briefly lost its peg. Now, it appears some investors have dropped the stablecoin for the competition.

entry.title: Encode Club Raises $5M for Web3 Developer Training
entry.summary: Galaxy Digital and Lemniscap led the round to help further Encode Club’s Web3 educational offerings.

entry.title: Coppola-Backed Decentralized Pictures Launches Web3 Film Funding Platform
entry.summary: The blockchain-based film financing application will launch with a $50,000 documentary funding award from The Gotham Film & Media Institute.

entry.title: What is Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC)?
entry.summary: As Ethereum's DeFi ecosystem grows, Bitcoin holders increasingly want to take part. Enter ERC-20 token Wrapped Bitcoin, a 1:1 representation of BTC.

entry.title: What Is Loopring? An Ethereum Tool for Decentralized Exchanges and Payments
entry.summary: Loopring protocol provides developers the tools they need to build their own decentralized exchanges.

entry.title: What is the Bitcoin Halving? How Bitcoin's Supply is Limited
entry.summary: Every four years, the amount of Bitcoin awarded to miners is halved, an event known as the Bitcoin halving.

entry.title: Cloudflare Expected to Run Ethereum Nodes as Merge Event Approaches
entry.summary: Internet security company Cloudflare has announced it will run and fully stake several Ethereum validator nodes in the coming months.

entry.title: Paxos, State Street, and Credit Suisse Trial Permissioned Blockchain for Same-Day Trade Settlement
entry.summary: In a recent pilot, State Street executed a "T+0" trade with Credit Suisse using Paxos' permissioned blockchain service.

entry.title: South Korea Launches 'Emergency' Inspections of Local Crypto Exchanges Amid Terra Collapse: Report
entry.summary: South Korea’s financial authorities have reportedly embarked on an emergency assessment of domestic crypto exchanges.

entry.title: Elon Musk: Twitter Deal 'Cannot Move Forward' Until CEO Shows Extent of Bot Activity
entry.summary: Elon Musk said that his $44 billion acquisition "cannot move forward" until he has determined precisely how many users on Twitter are fake.

entry.title: Solana NFTs Come 'Full Circle' as Okay Bears Knockoff Lands on Ethereum
entry.summary: Are they okay? Solana and Ethereum fans trade barbs after the surging Okay Bears gets a reverse-facing copycat.

entry.title: Twitch Co-Founder Raises $24M for Web3 Gaming Company Metatheory
entry.summary: Metatheory’s "DuskBreakers" aims to be a wide-ranging sci-fi franchise spanning across NFTs, games, and comics.

entry.title: What Is Avalanche Network (AVAX)? The 'Flexible' Ethereum Competitor
entry.summary: Avalanche is a platform for building powerful decentralized applications and custom blockchain implementations. Here's how it works.

entry.title: $1.2 Billion in Bitcoin Was Liquidated During Last Week's Crypto Crash
entry.summary: Terra's LUNA went to zero. Some Bitcoin traders also saw their accounts wiped out during last week’s market correction.

entry.title: High Times in Web3? My Trip to An Ethereum Metaverse Dispensary
entry.summary: The Crypto Cannabis Club is the latest dispensary to open in the metaverse—and you can even order weed for real-world delivery.

entry.title: Bitcoin's Seventh Straight Week in the Red Sets New Record
entry.summary: The previous six-week record happened in 2014.

entry.title: Portugal’s Status as a Crypto Tax Haven Appears to Be Ending
entry.summary: On Friday, the nation’s minister of finance announced that crypto soon will be subject to a 28% capital gains tax.

entry.title: Do Kwon Wants to Fork LUNA's Blockchain to Make 'Terra Classic'
entry.summary: Under a plan proposed by Do Kwon, the current chain would be renamed Terra Classic. The new chain would ditch the UST stablecoin.

entry.title: Institutions Poured $300M Into Bitcoin Funds During Terra Meltdown: Report
entry.summary: It’s a signal that they saw the market turmoil “as a buying opportunity," according to Coinshares.

entry.title: Chainlink Hires Google Vet Who Developed TensorFlow AI System
entry.summary: Chainlink's hiring of a key AI executive could boost the reliability of its oracle, upon which much of the crypto world relies.

entry.title: What is Lightning Network? Bitcoin's Scalability Solution
entry.summary: Lightning Network is a scaling solution that attempts to address Bitcoin's slow transaction speeds and high transaction costs.

entry.title: Binance CEO Says Exchange Never Sold Its 15.4M LUNA—Now Worth Just $2,461
entry.summary: At its peak, Binance’s holdings were worth $1.6 billion. Today, that same investment is worth just $2,461 following Terra’s collapse.

entry.title: What Is Bitcoin Backed By?
entry.summary: Bitcoin doesn't need to be backed by anything tangible to be valuable; like fiat currencies, much of its value derives from consumer confidence.

entry.title: Algorithmic Stablecoin From DEUS Finance Loses Dollar Peg, Plunging 30%
entry.summary: Yet another algorithmic stablecoin has lost its dollar peg as DEUS Finance's Terra-inspired DEI token plummets.

entry.title: LFG Unpacks Bitcoin Activity During LUNA, UST Collapse
entry.summary: The Luna Foundation Guard has revealed that it currently has only 313 BTC left in its reserves.

entry.title: Meet Fuzzle, the Adorable, Conspiracy-Spouting NFT That Offers Dating Advice
entry.summary: This AI-powered NFT can carry on conversations about politics, dating, religion, or even crypto.

entry.title: Australian Tax Authority Issues Stark Warning for Crypto, NFT Investors
entry.summary: Australian crypto investors have been warned by the authorities not to forget their tax obligations when selling digital assets.

entry.title: FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried: Bitcoin 'Not a Payments Network'
entry.summary: FTX chief Sam Bankman-Fried said that Bitcoin is limited by its high environmental costs and its inability to scale.

entry.title: Grayscale Launches European 'Future of Finance' ETF Tracking Crypto Firms
entry.summary: First rolled out in the U.S. in February, Grayscale’s “Future of Finance” ETF is now available on major stock exchanges in Europe.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: What is Web3?
entry.summary: Web3 is the next evolution of the Internet, built on blockchains. Blockchains are a new kind of database, making new types of peer-to-peer apps possible. This has profound implications for humanity.

entry.title: Vitalik and CZ Have Some Thoughts on Terra’s Demise
entry.summary: The Ethereum founder and Binance CEO separately took to Twitter this weekend to critique Terra—and the very premise of the UST token itself.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Do Kwon Takes Heat for UST Failure
entry.summary: Twitter was chaos this week as Terra’s two leading projects collapsed in unison.

entry.title: What Happened to Terra’s Bitcoin Reserve as UST and LUNA Crashed
entry.summary: New analysis reveals the fate of billions in Bitcoin that the Luna Foundation Guard said it deployed to protect UST.

entry.title: Bitcoin Breaches $30K as Ethereum, Cardano, Solana Join Weekend Rally
entry.summary: Last week, Bitcoin fell to $26,350, the lowest since December 2020.

entry.title: How Metaplex Is Solving Solana’s Network-Crashing NFT Botting Problem
entry.summary: After the recent downtime, Solana’s NFT protocol developers go on the offense against transaction-spamming bots.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Virtually Every Top 100 Cryptocurrency Sinks as LUNA Scrapes Bottom
entry.summary: Most major coins declined for the sixth straight week as Terra's LUNA went from $118 to zero in roughly a month.

entry.title: How Terra's UST and LUNA Imploded
entry.summary: Even as the entire crypto market tanked, the biggest story was the dual implosion of Terra's UST and LUNA. Here's what happened.

entry.title: Kraken CEO on Why the Bitcoin Exchange Left San Francisco: City Has ‘Deteriorated’
entry.summary: In April, Jesse Powell shut down Kraken’s San Francisco HQ. On the new gm podcast, he talked more about why—and lampooned the city’s progressive D.A.

entry.title: How Brands Are Creating Immersive Experiences in the Metaverse
entry.summary: In Episode 10 of the Navigating the Metaverse podcast, hosted by Cathy Hackl and Tommaso di Bartolo, Andrew Hayward of Decrypt and Josh Roth of Decrypt Studios discuss how companies are approaching the metaverse, where it could all go next, and what it was like to watch a movie in a Lamborghini on the moon.

entry.title: 7 Big Moments From Bitcoin and Crypto's Craziest Week Ever
entry.summary: What the hell just happened? Here's a rapid-fire look at the biggest moments that defined the craziest week in crypto history.

entry.title: #DecryptLIVE: Crypto crash roundtable
entry.summary: Crypto bloodbath! How low will the major coins go, and what about Terra and stablecoins? Decrypt’s Dan Roberts, Jeff Benson, Stacy Elliott and Jason Nelson will discuss the news and parse through what’s happened and what might happen next.

entry.title: Infura Co-Founder E.G. Galano Talks Otherside NFT Mint, Ethereum Gas Fees
entry.summary: Infura co-founder and general manager E.G. Galano talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin about what Infura does, how the Bored Ape Yacht Club could have avoided the hiccups with its Otherdeed NFT mint, other hot NFT collections like Moonbirds, and Ethereum's gas fee issues.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is Ethereum 2.0? Ethereum's Consensus Layer and Merge Explained
entry.summary: The long-planned upgrade to Ethereum aims to improve the network’s scalability and security by switching to a proof of stake consensus mechanism.

entry.title: gm Podcast, Episode 9: Jesse Powell Releases the Kraken
entry.summary: Kraken was one of the earliest Bitcoin exchanges, and also made waves for its strong-willed reactions to regulatory changes. CEO Jesse Powell joined the gm podcast to talk to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about Kraken's evolution, the killer use case for NFTs, and how San Francisco's tech scene has changed.

entry.title: Inside the Bored Ape Yacht Club NFT Restaurant in L.A.
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin interviews Kevin Seo, co-founder of Bored & Hungry, the BAYC-inspired burger joint in Los Angeles. Video shot and edited by Decrypt's Jason Nelson.

entry.title: gm Podcast, Episode 8: All About Avalanche with John Wu
entry.summary: Ava Labs president John Wu talks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about the meteoric rise of so-called "Ethereum killer" Avalanche (he hates that phrase), its utility and usability, AVAX token, tribalism in crypto, the SEC and regulation, and NFT backlash.

entry.title: NFT Artist pplpleasr: 'You Should Be Thinking of DAOs Like Subreddits'
entry.summary: Emily Yang, aka pplpleasr, the inspiration for the NFT collective PleasrDAO, talked DAOs and crypto interest groups on Decrypt's gm podcast with Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts. Yang says people shouldn't be joining DAOs with the aim of making money; she compares them to Subreddits or video game clans.
